name: functionality
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any or all of the operations performed by a piece of equipment or a software program

Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ]
  IT the tasks that a computer, software program, or piece of electronic equipment is able to do: Banks have realized they need to provide additional functionality at ATMs. With an out-of-date browser, some of the layout and functionalities on the web site may not work as intended.
[ U ] the quality of being useful, practical, and right for the purpose for which something was made: In civil engineering, a major component of functionality is safety.
